PageTitle: ds-lite log user enable (DS-Lite instance view)
FuncDef:
The ds-lite log user enable command enables DS-Lite user log functions.
The undo ds-lite log user enable command disables DS-Lite user log functions.
This function is disabled by default.
CLIs: ds-lite log user enable [ syslog | netstream ]
undo ds-lite log user enable [ syslog | netstream ]
ExtraInfo: To enable DS-Lite user log functions, run the ds-lite log user enable command.
